name: router-performance-check
description: Performance comparison between React Router, TanStack Router, and Next.js App Router

scripts.setup: pnpm install && concurrently "(cd react-router && pnpm install)" "(cd tanstack-router && pnpm install)" "(cd next && pnpm install)" && pnpm run setup:config
scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm --filter react-router dev" "pnpm --filter tanstack-router dev" "pnpm --filter next dev"
scripts.build: concurrently "pnpm --filter react-router build" "pnpm --filter tanstack-router build" "pnpm --filter next build"
scripts.preview: concurrently "pnpm --filter react-router preview" "pnpm --filter tanstack-router preview" "pnpm --filter next preview"
scripts.perf:cloudflare: pnpm run perf:cloudflare:measure && pnpm run perf:cloudflare:analyze && pnpm run perf:cloudflare:report
scripts.deploy: concurrently "pnpm run deploy:react-router" "pnpm run deploy:tanstack-router" "pnpm run deploy:next"
